permanent_shop.name: Ancient Barbarian Statue
permanent_shop.description: A stone statue depicting a fierce barbarian warrior from ancient times. This permanent decoration adds a sense of history and power to your village.
permanent_shop.availability: Permanently available in Shop for Gold

permanent_shop.name: Barbarian Statue
permanent_shop.description: A proud statue of the classic Barbarian, one of Clash's most iconic troops. Shows your appreciation for the basics.
permanent_shop.availability: Permanently available in Shop for Gold

permanent_shop.name: Dragon Statue
permanent_shop.description: An imposing statue of a dragon. When tapped by visiting players, it breathes fire and roars.
permanent_shop.availability: Permanently available in Shop for Gold (requires higher Town Hall)

permanent_shop.name: Champion Statue
permanent_shop.description: The rarest permanent shop decoration. This golden trophy can be tapped by visiting players to show your achievements.
permanent_shop.availability: Permanently available in Shop for very high Gold cost

war_league.name: Bronze League Medal
war_league.description: A bronze medal decoration showcasing your clan's achievement in War Leagues.
war_league.availability: Purchasable with League Medals, requires Bronze League or higher

war_league.name: Silver League Medal
war_league.description: A silver medal decoration displaying your clan's War League prowess.
war_league.availability: Purchasable with League Medals, requires Silver League or higher

war_league.name: Gold League Medal
war_league.description: A prestigious gold medal for clans competing at Gold League level.
war_league.availability: Purchasable with League Medals, requires Gold League or higher

war_league.name: Champion League Trophy
war_league.description: An elite trophy decoration for Champion League War participants.
war_league.availability: Purchasable with League Medals, requires Champion League

limited_events.name: Sleepy King
limited_events.description: An exclusive decoration showing the Barbarian King taking a royal nap. Part of Supercell ID Rewards.
limited_events.availability: Supercell ID Rewards - 3,000 points (available for 10 months)

limited_events.name: Brawl's Star
limited_events.description: A special decoration honoring Brawl Stars, Supercell's iconic game. Features a glowing star with Brawl Stars branding.
limited_events.availability: Supercell ID Rewards - 3,000 points (available for 10 months)

limited_events.name: Pretty Portal
limited_events.description: A swirling pink portal rotating counterclockwise with magical sparkles, framed by tree branches and leafy vines on stone steps.

limited_events.name: Cuddly Chest
limited_events.description: A wooden treasure chest surrounded by gold coins. Opens and closes its lid, revealing a turquoise tongue and chomping teeth in a playful animation.

limited_events.name: Storied Statue
limited_events.description: Commemorates the 'Lost and Crowned' short film (September 2020). Depicts Larry and Peter reaching for a spinning golden crown.

limited_events.name: Decision Dice
limited_events.description: A floating green decision dice suspended above a glowing purple dent. Can be tapped to roll a new number.
limited_events.availability: Tabletop RPG Season - 515 Event Medals or Gold Pass

limited_events.name: Festival Lantern
limited_events.description: A beautiful Diwali-themed lantern that glows warmly. A real celebration delight!

limited_events.name: 9th Anniversary Cake
limited_events.description: A special cake released to celebrate Clash of Clans' 9th anniversary in August 2021.

limited_events.name: Red Campaign Statue
limited_events.description: Barbarian King statue with red shoulder armor from the 2016 Red Campaign charity event.
limited_events.availability: Red Campaign Event (2016) - Later added to shop without red coloring

limited_events.name: Master Builder Statue
limited_events.description: A statue of the Master Builder who returned in September 2017 as part of a limited edition pack.

lunar_new_year.name: Lunar New Year Dragon
lunar_new_year.description: A festive dragon decoration celebrating the Lunar New Year. Features fireworks effects when tapped.
lunar_new_year.availability: Lunar New Year Event 2018 - 500 Gold to remove, gives 25,000 Gold

lunar_new_year.name: Golden Money Bag
lunar_new_year.description: A golden bag overflowing with coins. When tapped, plays gold collection sound effects and shows gold scattering.
lunar_new_year.availability: Lunar New Year Event 2018 - 1,000 Gold to remove, gives 75,000 Gold

lunar_new_year.name: Snake Festival Decoration
lunar_new_year.description: A super decoration celebrating the Year of the Snake with special Lunar New Year theming.
lunar_new_year.availability: Snake Festival Medal Event (Feb 2025) - Snake Medals in Trader Shop

clashmas_trees.name: 2012 Clashmas Tree
clashmas_trees.description: The original Christmas tree from Clash's launch year. Features a unique design different from later years.
clashmas_trees.availability: Spawned naturally during Clashmas 2012 - No longer available

clashmas_trees.name: 2013 Clashmas Tree
clashmas_trees.description: A festive evergreen tree covered in snow and decorations. Appears during winter season.
clashmas_trees.availability: Spawned naturally during Clashmas 2013 - No longer available

clashmas_trees.name: 2019 Clashmas Tree
clashmas_trees.description: A snowy Christmas tree with twinkling lights. When touched, snow falls and you hear festive sounds.
clashmas_trees.availability: Spawned naturally during Clashmas 2019 - 25,000 Gold to remove, gives 75,000 Gold

clashmas_trees.name: 2020 Clashmas Tree
clashmas_trees.description: Another year's festive tree with unique decorations and effects.

clashmas_trees.name: 2021 Clashmas Tree
clashmas_trees.description: Features festive lights that twinkle. Part of the Rudolph series theme.
clashmas_trees.availability: Spawned naturally during Clashmas 2021 or Gold Pass reward

halloween.name: 2015 Halloween Cauldron
halloween.description: A bubbling cauldron that makes spooky sounds when tapped. During Halloween 2015, made special Halloween sounds.
halloween.availability: Spawned naturally during Halloween 2015 - No longer available

halloween.name: 2017 Halloween Tombstone
halloween.description: A spooky tombstone with eerie effects and sounds when touched.
halloween.availability: Spawned naturally during Halloween 2017 - No longer available

halloween.name: 2018 Halloween Obstacle
halloween.description: Special Halloween-themed obstacle with spooky voice effects when tapped.
halloween.availability: Spawned naturally during Halloween 2018 - No longer available

anniversary_cakes.name: 5th Anniversary Cake
anniversary_cakes.description: A celebration cake with strawberries on top, released for Clash's 5th birthday.
anniversary_cakes.availability: Spawned naturally during 5th Anniversary - 10,000 Gold to remove

anniversary_cakes.name: 6th Anniversary Cake
anniversary_cakes.description: Similar to 5th anniversary but with blueberries instead of strawberries on top.

anniversary_cakes.name: 8th Anniversary Cake
anniversary_cakes.description: A pink cake with a sword stuck into it. When touched, a barbarian pops out and strikes a bodybuilding pose with cheering sounds.
anniversary_cakes.availability: Spawned during 8th Anniversary - 10,000 Gold to remove, gives 101,010 Gold

anniversary_cakes.name: 10th Anniversary Cake
anniversary_cakes.description: Three gift boxes stacked on top of each other. When touched, shows special animations.

special_events.name: Gem Box
special_events.description: A mysterious box packed with gems! Rare and valuable - you can only have 1 at a time.
special_events.availability: Spawns randomly in villages - 1,000 Elixir to remove, gives 25 Gems

special_events.name: Spike-y Cactus
special_events.description: Released to celebrate Brawl Stars launch. Resembles the Brawler character Spike.
special_events.availability: Spawned during Brawl Stars celebration event - No longer available

special_events.name: Mysterious Object
special_events.description: A soccer ball obstacle for the Clash with Haaland event. Bounces when selected.
special_events.availability: Spawned during Clash with Haaland event (April 2024)

special_events.name: Money in the Bank
special_events.description: A WWE-themed briefcase with the WWE logo, overflowing with dollar bills featuring Goblin Builder faces.

special_events.name: Ancient Stone
special_events.description: An extremely rare odd-looking stone from very early game versions. Only a handful of players still have it.
special_events.availability: No longer available - became unobtainable shortly after game release

meteorites_2025.name: Glowy Ore Meteorite
meteorites_2025.description: A glowing meteorite that provides special ore resources when removed.

barbarian_king.name: Skeleton King
barbarian_king.description: A Halloween-themed skeletonized king carrying a tombstone sword. Features unique animations where arms fall off while holding sword.
barbarian_king.availability: Gold Pass (October 2019 Season) - Later available for 1,500 Gems (October 2020)

barbarian_king.name: Rudolph King
barbarian_king.description: Part of the Rudolph series with festive Christmas theme. Released alongside Rudolph Warden and Clashmas Queen.

barbarian_king.name: Haaland King
barbarian_king.description: Collaboration skin with soccer star Erling Haaland. Perfectly recreates Haaland's appearance in Clash universe.

barbarian_king.name: Squad Busters King
barbarian_king.description: Released as pre-registration reward for Squad Busters. Features Squad Busters art style.

barbarian_king.name: Half-Orcish King
barbarian_king.description: Tabletop RPG themed skin featuring a half-orc warrior design.

barbarian_king.name: Berserker King
barbarian_king.description: Part of the Cosmic Curse season with fierce cosmic warrior theme.

barbarian_king.name: Dark Days King
barbarian_king.description: Noir-style vintage gangster with pinstripe outfit and old-school swagger from the Dark Days theme.

archer_queen.name: Ice Queen
archer_queen.description: A frozen-themed queen with icy effects and animations.

archer_queen.name: Clashmas Queen
archer_queen.description: Part of the Christmas series alongside Rudolph King and Rudolph Warden.

archer_queen.name: Gladiator Queen
archer_queen.description: Roman gladiator-themed queen with classical warrior design.
archer_queen.availability: Gold Pass (September 2021 Season) - Available for 1,500 Gems (September 2022)

archer_queen.name: 9th Anniversary Queen
archer_queen.description: Special anniversary skin that shoots records instead of arrows. First skin to change AQ's attack effects.
archer_queen.availability: Gold Pass (August 2021 Season) - Available for 1,500 Gems (August 2022)

archer_queen.name: World Championship Queen
archer_queen.description: Celebrates 2021 CoC World Championship with special flame effects and champion-themed archers.

archer_queen.name: Archer Hunter (Cosmic Curse)
archer_queen.description: Goth-themed queen from Cosmic Curse season with dark celestial energy and haunted appearance.

archer_queen.name: Dark Days Archer Queen
archer_queen.description: Vintage noir-style queen with sleek trench coat and sharp black-and-white aesthetic.
archer_queen.availability: Dark Days Season - Available in Shop

grand_warden.name: Rudolph Warden
grand_warden.description: Christmas-themed warden as part of the Rudolph series with festive reindeer elements.

grand_warden.name: Wild West Warden
grand_warden.availability: Special offer alongside Wild West King

grand_warden.name: Eternal Warden
grand_warden.description: Cosmic-themed warden who transformed a meteoroid into a deliverer of doom for Cosmic Curse season.

grand_warden.name: Tabletop RPG Grand Warden
grand_warden.description: Dungeons & Dragons inspired warden design from Tabletop RPG season.
grand_warden.availability: Gold Pass (September 2024) - Added back after community feedback

royal_champion.name: Jungle Champion
royal_champion.description: Tropical jungle-themed champion with nature-inspired design.

royal_champion.name: Gladiator Champion
royal_champion.description: Part of the Gladiator collection with classical warrior theme.

royal_champion.name: Winter Champion
royal_champion.description: Festive winter-themed champion with snowy effects.

royal_champion.name: Shadow Champion
royal_champion.description: Dark shadow-themed champion from the Shadow collection.

royal_champion.name: Primal Champion
royal_champion.description: Prehistoric tribal-themed champion from Primal collection.

royal_champion.name: Summer Champion
royal_champion.description: Beach and summer-themed champion with tropical vibes.

royal_champion.name: Party Champion
royal_champion.description: Celebratory party-themed champion with festive design.

royal_champion.name: Pixel Champion
royal_champion.description: Retro 8-bit pixel art styled champion from Pixel collection.

royal_champion.name: Magic Champion
royal_champion.description: Mystical magic-themed champion with spell effects from Magic collection.

royal_champion.name: Pirate Champion
royal_champion.description: Swashbuckling pirate-themed champion from Pirate collection.

royal_champion.name: Jolly Champion
royal_champion.description: Cheerful Christmas-themed champion from Jolly collection.

royal_champion.name: Cursed Champion
royal_champion.description: Haunted cosmic champion from Cosmic Curse season with dark celestial powers.

minion_prince.name: Nightmare Prince
minion_prince.description: Dark noir-era styled prince from Cosmic Curse season, swapping playful flair for sharp black-and-white aesthetics.
minion_prince.availability: Cosmic Curse Season special offer (October 5-31, 2024) - Features Meteor Staff Equipment

minion_prince.name: Dark Days Minion Prince
minion_prince.description: Noir-era rebel with black-and-white vintage gangster look fitting the gritty Dark Days streets.

sceneries.name: Cosmic Scenery
sceneries.description: A meteoroid that drifted peacefully across the cosmos until transformed by Eternal Warden into a doom deliverer. Features space and meteor themes.

sceneries.name: Dark Days Scenery
sceneries.description: Transforms village into a moody black-and-white cityscape with dark alleys and flickering lights. Complete noir film aesthetic.
